languages.text: {n}Жрец утвердительно кивает.{/n} "Духи-из-тьмы обрушили огненный дождь на Кетца Темер, истребив множество племен, заботящихся о младых и древних лесах. Святотатство разгневало духов-защитников, но как только этот слуга ветра, дождя и песка умилостивил их жертвенными дарами и божественными чарами, ярость сменилась милостью".

traits.locale_text: {n}Жрец утвердительно кивает.{/n} "Духи-из-тьмы обрушили огненный дождь на Кетца-аль Хет, истребив множество племен, заботящихся о младых и древних лесах. Святотатство разгневало духов-защитников, но как только этот слуга ветра, дождя и песка умилостивил их жертвенными дарами и божественными чарами, ярость сменилась милостью".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}The priest nods affirmatively.{/n} "The spirits-from-the-darkness brought the fire-rain down on Quetza Temer, killing many of the tribes who had cared for the forests young and ancient. This blasphemy enraged the guardian spirits, but as soon as this servant of the wind, rain, and sand soothed them with the ritual sacrifices and divine sorcery, their wrath gave way to mercy."
languages.original_text: {n}Жрец утвердительно кивает.{/n} "Духи-из-тьмы обрушили огненный дождь на Кетца Темер, истребив множество племен, заботящихся о младых и древних лесах. Святотатство разгневало духов-защитников, но как только этот слуга ветра, дождя и песка умилостивил их жертвенными дарами и божественными чарами, ярость сменилась милостью".

traits.locale_text: {n}The priest nods affirmatively.{/n} "The spirits from the darkness had brought down the rain of fire on Quetza Temer, killing many of the tribes who had been taking care of the forests both young and ancient. This blasphemy enraged the guardian spirits, but as soon as this servant of the wind, rain, and sand pacified them with the ritual sacrifices and divine sorcery, their wrath gave way to mercy."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}El sacerdote asiente con la cabeza.{/n} «Los espíritus de las tinieblas desataron una lluvia de fuego sobre Quetza Temer, destruyendo a muchas de las tribus que cuidaban de los bosques tanto jóvenes como antiguos. Aquella blasfemia enfureció a los espíritus guardianes, pero tan pronto este siervo del viento, la lluvia y la arena pudo amansarlos con sacrificios rituales y su divina hechicería, su cólera se tornó misericordia».
languages.original_text: {n}The priest nods affirmatively.{/n} "The spirits-from-the-darkness brought the fire-rain down on Quetza Temer, killing many of the tribes who had cared for the forests young and ancient. This blasphemy enraged the guardian spirits, but as soon as this servant of the wind, rain, and sand soothed them with the ritual sacrifices and divine sorcery, their wrath gave way to mercy."

traits.locale_text: {n}El sacerdote asiente con la cabeza.{/n} «Los espíritus de las tinieblas desataron una lluvia de fuego sobre Quetza Temer, destruyendo a muchas de las tribus que cuidaban de los bosques tanto jóvenes como antiguos. Aquella blasfemia enfureció a los espíritus guardianes, pero tan pronto este siervo del viento, la lluvia y la arena pudo apaciguarlos con sacrificios rituales y su divina hechicería, su cólera se tornó misericordia».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}祭司确信地点着头。{/n}“黑暗精魂为格扎尔特默降下了倾盆火雨，屠戮了无数一直在照顾森林的部落，不分老幼。这种亵渎之举激怒了守护之灵，但这位疾风、甘雨与沙尘的仆人举行祭祀仪式与神圣巫术，安抚了守护之灵，他们的愤怒就转为了仁慈。”
languages.original_text: {n}The priest nods affirmatively.{/n} "The spirits-from-the-darkness brought the fire-rain down on Quetza Temer, killing many of the tribes who had cared for the forests young and ancient. This blasphemy enraged the guardian spirits, but as soon as this servant of the wind, rain, and sand soothed them with the ritual sacrifices and divine sorcery, their wrath gave way to mercy."

traits.locale_text: {n}祭司确信地点着头。{/n}“黑暗精魂为格扎尔特默降下了倾盆火雨，屠戮了无数一直在照顾森林的部落，不分老幼。这种亵渎之举激怒了守护之灵，但这位疾风、甘雨与沙尘的仆人举行祭祀仪式与神圣巫术，安抚了守护之灵，他们的愤怒就转为了仁慈。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}Le prêtre hoche la tête.{/n} « Les esprits des ténèbres ont fait tomber une pluie de feu sur Quetza Temer, tuant de nombreuses tribus qui s'occupaient des forêts, jeunes et anciennes. Ce blasphème a enragé les esprits gardiens, mais dès que ce serviteur du vent, de la pluie et du sable les a apaisés grâce aux sacrifices rituels et à la sorcellerie divine, leur colère s'est muée en pitié. »
languages.original_text: {n}The priest nods affirmatively.{/n} "The spirits-from-the-darkness brought the fire-rain down on Quetza Temer, killing many of the tribes who had cared for the forests young and ancient. This blasphemy enraged the guardian spirits, but as soon as this servant of the wind, rain, and sand soothed them with the ritual sacrifices and divine sorcery, their wrath gave way to mercy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prêtre hoche la tête.{/n} « Les esprits des ténèbres ont fait tomber une pluie de feu sur Quetza Temer, tuant de nombreuses tribus qui s'occupaient des forêts, jeunes et anciennes. Ce blasphème a enragé les esprits gardiens, mais dès que ce serviteur du vent, de la pluie et du sable les a pacifiés grâce aux sacrifices rituels et à la sorcellerie divine, leur colère s'est muée en pitié. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}司祭は頷く。{/n}「闇の精霊がケツァ・テメルに火の雨を降らせ、森を守っていた多くの部族を、若きも古きも殺した。この冒涜は守護精霊を激怒させたが、この風と雨、砂のしもべが儀式の生贄と神の魔術で彼らをなだめると、すぐに彼らの怒りは慈悲に変わったのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The priest nods affirmatively.{/n} "The spirits-from-the-darkness brought the fire-rain down on Quetza Temer, killing many of the tribes who had cared for the forests young and ancient. This blasphemy enraged the guardian spirits, but as soon as this servant of the wind, rain, and sand soothed them with the ritual sacrifices and divine sorcery, their wrath gave way to mercy."

traits.locale_text: {n}司祭は頷く。{/n}「闇の精霊がケツァ・テメルに火の雨を降らせ、森を守っていた多くの部族を、若きも古きも殺した。この冒涜は守護精霊を激怒させたが、この風と雨、砂のしもべが儀式の生贄と神の魔術で彼らをなだめると、すぐに彼らの怒りは慈悲に変わったのだ」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}Der Priester nickt bestätigend.{/n} "Die Geister-aus-der-Dunkelheit haben den Feuer-Regen auf Quetza Temer herabgerufen und viele Mitglieder des Stammes getötet, die sich um die Wälder kümmerten. Junge wie alte. Diese Blasphemie erzürnte die Wächtergeister, doch kaum hatte dieser Diener des Windes, des Regens und des Sandes sie mit rituellen Opfern und göttlicher Hexerei befriedet, wich ihr Zorn Gnade."
languages.original_text: {n}The priest nods affirmatively.{/n} "The spirits-from-the-darkness brought the fire-rain down on Quetza Temer, killing many of the tribes who had cared for the forests young and ancient. This blasphemy enraged the guardian spirits, but as soon as this servant of the wind, rain, and sand soothed them with the ritual sacrifices and divine sorcery, their wrath gave way to mercy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Priester nickt bestätigend.{/n} "Die Geister aus der Dunkelheit haben den Regen des Feuers auf Quetza Temer herabgerufen und viele Mitglieder des Stammes getötet, die sich um die Wälder kümmerten. Junge wie alte. Diese Blasphemie erzürnte die Wächtergeister, doch kaum hatte dieser Diener des Windes, des Regens und des Sandes sie mit rituellen Opfern und göttlicher Hexerei befriedet, wich ihr Zorn Gnade."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}Rahip, onaylayarak başını eğiyor.{/n} "Karanlıktan gelen ruhlar, Quetza Temer'e ateş yağmuru yağdırarak eski ve yeni tüm ormanlarla ilgilenen pek çok kabilenin canını aldılar. Bu aykırılık, muhafız ruhları öfkelendirdi ancak rüzgârın, yağmurun ve kumun bu hizmetkârı, ayindeki kurbanlar ve ilahi sahirliklerle onları yatıştırdı. Gazapları, merhamete yol verdi."
languages.original_text: {n}The priest nods affirmatively.{/n} "The spirits-from-the-darkness brought the fire-rain down on Quetza Temer, killing many of the tribes who had cared for the forests young and ancient. This blasphemy enraged the guardian spirits, but as soon as this servant of the wind, rain, and sand soothed them with the ritual sacrifices and divine sorcery, their wrath gave way to mercy."
